title: Person of Interest - 5x04 '6,741' - Root & Shaw Sex Scene
author: POISuit
comment: I'm glad those two finally got together. Too bad it was a "dream sequence." I'm sure their love will be requited before the series is over.

I like how the most intimate scene is after the sex scene when they’re talking and Shaw says Root was her safe place and she was vulnerable. Of course it’s a dream/a mental escape from the psychological torture.
is it just me or did anyone else laughed their pants off (no pun intended) by the comment " I already wanted to tear Samaritan apart, turned into an atari!... hahahahahaha....
I played this in 2x and omg it's hilarious!
